title: Get up to 19% OFF from the Fitbit Charge 6’s Price with this Deal!
description: Start off those New Year's resolutions with this offer. The post Get up to 19% OFF from the Fitbit Charge 6’s Price with this Deal! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Start off those New Year's resolutions with this offer.
text: If you’re after a reasonably-priced fitness tracker that doesn’t compromise on specs and features, then you might want to check out this offer for the Fitbit Charge 6. The Fitbit Charge 6 is the current iteration of the brand’s fitness tracker line, and this deal brings down its price with as much as 25% off. Don’t let the small size fool you – the Fitbit Charge 6 comes with compatibility for both Android and iOS devices via the Fitbit app, and is able to keep an eye on metrics such as heart rate, sleep quality, ECG and irregular Heart Rhythm Notifications, Oxygen saturation (SpO2) Monitoring, in addition to more than 40 different exercise modes. It also comes in a sleek and premium design – you can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart.
